basics.name: Manoj Pisini
basics.label: Multi-Domain Engineer
basics.summary: Full-stack engineer and systems architect bridging the gap between high-level branding and low-level logic. 3+ years of experience in building secure, scalable applications and leading multidisciplinary engineering teams.

work.name: Katalyst Business Partners Pvt. Ltd
work.summary: Developing core security and monitoring infrastructure for enterprise-scale business logic.
highlights: Optimized system reliability by 30% through advanced performance profiling and automated testing suites.
Architected secure internal communication protocols using modern cryptographic standards.
Streamlined CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment latency by 45%.
Implemented real-time telemetry and monitoring dashboards for critical system health.

work.name: NIT Raipur Robotics Club
work.summary: Led a team of 80+ student engineers in developing precise robotics systems and autonomous logic.
highlights: Orchestrated the development of high-precision positioning systems for autonomous rovers.
Led workshops on embedded systems, Linux architecture, and machine learning integration.
Designed and implemented sensor fusion algorithms for meteorological simulation platforms.
Managed resource allocation and sprint planning for multiple concurrent project tracks.

work.name: State Co-operative Dairy Federation
work.summary: Applied analytical modeling to optimize manufacturing and supply chain operations.
highlights: Analyzed operational data to identify bottlenecks in the production cycle.
Proposed process refinements resulting in a 15% increase in operational efficiency.
Built custom visualization tools for monitoring dairy cold-chain metrics.
